name: Easy Dogecoin Gateway
author: Dogecoin Foundation

sections.description:
Accept Dogecoin Payments simply by using your Dogecoin Address or your Twitter account connected to the MyDoge.com or sodogetip.xyz Wallets without the need of any third party payment processor, banks or extra fees. Your store, your wallet, your Doge.
It uses the Google API to generate QR Codes and the CoinGecko API to convert Fiat into Dogecoin current value.
sections.faq:
What is Dogecoin?

Dogecoin is a cryptocurrency created by software engineers Billy Markus and Jackson Palmer, who decided to create a payment system as a “joke”, making fun of the wild speculation in cryptocurrencies at the time. It is considered both the first “meme coin”, and, more specifically, the first “dog coin”. Itâ€™s currently being accepted by some of the leading retailers in the world.

Is Dogecoin Money?

Yes

Where can I get a Dogecoin Wallet?

We recomend using the official wallet on https://dogecoin.com or using the mobile wallet on https://mydoge.com

Where can I buy Dogecoin?

You can mine Doge using an ASIC computer or you can buy Doge with Fiat money (Dollars/Euros/etc) on any exchange like http://coinbase.com, http://Kraken.com, http://Binance.com, http://Ftx.com, http://Etoro.com, http://Robinhood.com or even directly on the http://mydoge.com mobile wallet.
